description: ​Google is introducing multiple anti-theft and data protection features later this year, some available only for Android 15+ devices, while others will roll out to billions of devices running Android 10 and later. [...]
title: Android to add new anti-theft and data protection features

description: Today, Google announced new security features coming to Android 15 and Google Play that will help block scams, fraud, and malware apps on users' devices. [...]
title: Android 15, Google Play get new anti-malware and anti-fraud features

description: Nissan North America (Nissan) suffered a data breach last year when a threat actor targeted the company's external VPN and shut down systems to receive a ransom. [...]
title: Nissan North America data breach impacts over 53,000 employees

description: ​The U.S. Department of Justice has indicted two brothers for allegedly manipulating the Ethereum blockchain and stealing $25 million worth of cryptocurrency within approximately 12 seconds in a "first-of-its-kind" scheme. [...]
title: Brothers arrested for $25 million theft in Ethereum blockchain attack

description: Apple's antifraud technology has blocked more than $7 billion in potentially fraudulent transactions in four years, the company states in its latest annual fraud prevention analysis. [...]
title: Apple blocked $7 billion in fraudulent App Store purchases in 4 years

description: ​Financially motivated cybercriminals abuse the Windows Quick Assist feature in social engineering attacks to deploy Black Basta ransomware payloads on victims' networks. [...]
title: Windows Quick Assist abused in Black Basta ransomware attacks

description: The FBI has seized the notorious BreachForums hacking forum used to leak and sell stolen corporate data to other cybercriminals. [...]
title: FBI seize BreachForums hacking forum used to leak stolen data

description: Banco Santander S.A. announced it suffered a data breach impacting customers after an unauthorized actor accessed a database hosted by one of its third-party service providers. [...]
title: Banco Santander warns of a data breach exposing customer info

description: Alexey Pertsev, one of the main developers of the Tornado Cash cryptocurrency tumbler has been sentenced to 64 months in prison for his part in helping launder more than $2 billion worth of cryptocurrency. [...]
title: Tornado Cash cryptomixer dev gets 64 months for laundering $2 billion
